title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table display different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: Datetime values retrieved from a table are being displayed in different formats in the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
OB: When retrieving datetime values from a table, they are displayed differently in the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
EB: The datetime values retrieved from the table should be formatted consistently in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Insert a dynamic text item
2. Insert a data/text item
3. Retrieve datetime values from a table and display them in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item
